name: Merchants of Memory
description:
This is my entry for Ludum Dare 44.

In this puzzle game, you trade memories with clients.  Drag the memories from your inventory into the wanted slots.  Only the memories with the tags the client wants will be accepted.  Click the trade button to finish the deal and gain their memories.

 Gaining new clients cost you life and absorbing a memory regains some life.  Now to work on more memories to put in the game, including ones with more than one tag (happy, sad, etc.).
